The World-Honored One benefits me, appearing in the world;
When expounding this Dharma, I have no doubts.
Now it is fulfilled, the Buddha's appearance is inconceivable;
My net of views is thin, now I escape the net of Mara.
I have already severed birth and death, already dwelling in the site of enlightenment;
When the Tathagata expounds the characteristics, he cuts off my doubts and bonds.
For me, he expounds the attainment, destroying all views, etc.;
Fearless, benefiting the world, well removing my mental defilements.
The Sutra of the Youth Sudasaputra, Scroll 1
